plot: Long Range Pursuit features brothers Mike and Aaron Davidson as they take time off from building long range rifles at Gunwerks to pursue extreme Western hunting.
plot_en: Long Range Pursuit features brothers Mike and Aaron Davidson as they take time off from building long range rifles at Gunwerks to pursue extreme Western hunting.
plot_es: Long Range Pursuit features brothers Mike and Aaron Davidson as they take time off from building long range rifles at Gunwerks to pursue extreme Western hunting.
title: Long Range Pursuit
